If you love your wife and truly care for her ,then her giving away these flowers to her mother doesn't matter at all .Your intention was to make her happy and to show your love for her ,she acknowledged this but her way of appreciation was gifting it to her mum ( I'm assuming here that she's quite close to her mum and wanted to give her the best gift that she could possibly get ).While it'd be wise on her part to discuss it with you before taking such step,she might have got reasons of her own for doing so.At some point in time ,you can discuss this matter with her in a light manner ( I hope she'll appreciate your views)

As Dr Seuss said : "Be who you are and say what you feel ,those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind "
